sentences.cn: 羽毛球是一种室内运动.

sentences.en: But most are indoor games, frequently what are called parlor games or party games.
sentences.cn: 但是大多数是室内游戏, 称为客厅或派对游戏.

sentences.en: I like to go indoor climbing.
If the weather is bad, I'll play indoor sports, too.
sentences.cn: 如果天气不好, 我也会从事室内运动.

sentences.en: Indoor climbing is good exercise, and you don't need to worry about the weather.
sentences.cn: 室内攀岩是一项很好的运动, 你不必担心天气.

sentences.en: Indoor pollution falls into two categories, that which we can see or smell, and pollution which is invisible and produces no odour.
sentences.cn: 室内污染分为两种：一种是我们能看得见或闻得着的，另一种是无色无味的。

sentences.en: My own involvement with the indoor environment and its effects on people started in 1968.
sentences.cn: 我开始研究室内环境及其对人的影响是在1968年.

sentences.en: No smoking in any indoor facilities.
sentences.cn: 所有室内场所都不许吸烟。

sentences.en: Right. Bowling is also an indoor sport.
sentences.cn: 对. 保龄球也是室内运动.

sentences.en: Sections 301 - 311, added in 1988, relate to indoor radon abatement.
sentences.cn: 1988年增加的第301—311条, 涉及的是室内氧的控制问题.

sentences.en: Table tennis is an indoor game.
sentences.cn: 乒乓球是室内运动项目.

sentences.en: The book gives handy hints on looking after indoor plants.
sentences.cn: 这本书提供了一些关于如何照料室内花草的有用信息。

sentences.en: The price for indoor courts is £10 per hour at peak times and £7 per hour at off-peak times.
sentences.cn: 室内球场的价格在高峰时段为每小时10英镑，非高峰时段为每小时7英镑。

sentences.en: The spa has 6 indoor pools, 2 for women only, 2 for men only, and 2 for mixed bathing.
sentences.cn: 这个温泉有6个室内池子，其中2个仅供女士，2个仅供男士，其余2个可以男女共用。

sentences.en: Too much central heating can harm indoor plants.
sentences.cn: 中央供暖系统温度太高对室内植物有害。

trans.tran_cn: 室内的，户内的，在室内使用的，待在家里的，救济院内的
trans.tran_en: used or happening inside a building
